about_the_game:
Discover the fractured world of You Belong in the Stars, where you travel from solar system to solar system using the ancient artifact known as the Uncompass, which you can obtain one way, or another from its residing, most powerful entities.

Engage in dogfights with smaller spacecraft or pilot larger cruisers. Choose from a wide selection of ships, each with unique combat abilities and utilities to attack, defend, or even exit your ship to fight enemies inside space stations or other vessels.

Completing quests earns you money to spend on ships and equipment, while also improving your reputation with the quest-giving organization. Meanwhile, your target’s opinion of you worsens, eventually forcing them to take action against you. The reputation system in You Belong in the Stars determines whether organizations will be friendly or hostile towards you and others.

You Belong in the Stars gives you the freedom to explore its vast solar and star systems, but traveling between them is no simple task. Your mission is to gather ancient artifacts known as Uncompasses, which enable travel between systems and galaxies, each one bringing you closer to a mysterious point in the universe. What awaits at your final destination?

We plan a release in late November or early December. depending on the state of the game it might be an early access release, which would push back the final release a couple of months. Due to the sandbox nature of this game, we would like to update it indefinitely, in the final release we plan to have the following features:

  •  50+ unique ships drawn by Delu

  • some of these ships have walkable interiors that you can seamlessly enter and exit on foot or in a vehicle that fits through the doors

  • 10+ origins, most of them unlockable after achieving certain feats in the campaign

  • a large amount and variety of quests:

    • dogfighting

    • securing locations through a shootout outside of your ship

    • Saving friendly ships in emergencies

    • boss fights

    • some special quests that won't fit these categories 

    • mining

  • 10+ different solar systems with various orgs, locations and events in them

  • more cute anime girls

name: You Belong in the Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore the stars in this 2D top-down sci-fi game, where you can engage in dogfights with spaceships or disembark to challenge your enemies on foot. Complete contracts, unlock stronger ships, and discover ancient mysteries hidden in forgotten galaxies.
